title: Clementine Apparel - Girls and Women Dance Bra with Clear Detachable Straps Unpadded & Seamless
descriptions:
Step into the spotlight with confidence. The Clementine Apparel Girls and Women Dance Bra is designed to disappear under your costume while delivering the secure, comfortable support you need.

- Virtually invisible: Clear, detachable, and adjustable straps blend seamlessly under leotards and performance wear, perfect for backless and no-show looks.
- Seamless comfort: Smooth, unpadded construction in a nude tone creates a clean silhouette with no lines, bumps, or distractions.
- Made for movement: Stays put through turns, leaps, and long rehearsals—ideal for ballet, competitions, practice, and all active pursuits.
- Customizable fit: Adjustable straps allow you to personalize support without sacrificing freedom of movement.

From studio to stage, this no-show dance bra is your reliable base layer—comfortable, secure, and performance-ready every time.
